channel.title: AI on DH Pitt
channel.description: Recent content in AI on DH Pitt

item.title: InBrief - using AI to summarize environmental impact statements
item.description: In affiliation with the Taubman College of Architecture and Urban Planning @ University of Michigan As part of Taubman College’s urban technology prototype grant program, I’m building a system that uses new large language modeling (LLM) technology to summarize the lengthy environmental impact analyses (EIAs) required of most urban development projects. In the half century since the National Environmental Protection Act (NEPA), these documents have stretched from an average length of 10 pages to over 1,600 pages.
